name: Crazy Racer - ultimate challenge
description:
Game Description:Mobile phone racing game,let's go to the racing！

Game Features:A variety of cars,there will always be your choice selected,3D design that grabs an eye,lifelike scenes and vehicles,the height of the fascinating addiction playability,And vivid sound effects,which will give you build a true 3 d racing experience.Your death high-speed racing car,left all the way go flying by.

Playing Method:Players according to the left and right keys to move the vehicle,in the process of driving on absorbing all coins and cans for acceleration value and power source.Experience the speed racing at the same time, the player needs through a variety of obstacles to make car further.
